mapper.insert: INSERT INTO judgements (user_id, post_id, judgement, regdate) VALUES (#{userId}, #{postId}, #{judgementType}, NOW());
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN judgement = 'positive' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS positiveCount, SUM(CASE WHEN judgement = 'negative' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS negativeCount FROM judgements WHERE post_id = #{postId}
